medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Ms. Q experienced a generalized tonic-clonic seizure about 30 months prior to this conference. After the seizure, imaging revealed a right temporal mass, which was diagnosed as a low-grade glioma. Following the first surgery, there were recurrences of the tumor requiring additional resections.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of Hashimoto thyroiditis requiring no therapy; underwent an uneventful cholecystectomy for cholecystitis in the past.
medical_history.social_history: Ms. Q has never smoked, and does not use alcohol or drugs. She is currently not working, is a health care professional, and is married with children.
